entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • .NET January 2024 Updates #289
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-0056: Microsoft.Data.SqlClient and System.Data.SqlClient SQL Data provider Information Disclosure Vulnerability #292

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow ContiguousCollectionMarshaller Free/FromUnmanaged to take length parameter #96820
  • JIT: simple range check is not branchless #96819
  • XUnitLogChecker: Unable to find dumps in Linux #96818
  • Enable CMake policy CMP0092 and update the corresponding compile options throughout the repo. #96815
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Extend Immutable Collection with Update function #96810
  • Update pinned System.Reflection.Metadata and System.Collections.Immutable versions to 8.0.0 #96809
  • Downgrade arity error to warning in some cases for ContiguousCollectionMarshaller #96801
    Future
  • Xml_TypeInCollectibleALC Test Fails in CI with Unexisting Assembly Under PreGenMode when TestReadyToRun is Enabled #96799
    Future
  • [8.0] Error while retrieving client Settings for PipelineArtifact. HttpRequestException: nodename nor servname provided, or not known (vsblobprodcus3.vsblob.visualstudio.com:443) #96798
  • [8.0] HttpClient test failure - attempting to access disposed object #96797
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator.Tests Fails at SgenCommandTest when TestReadyToRun is Enabled #96796
    Future
  • [8.0] runtime-extra-platforms: ios and tvos - Trimming assemblies requires .NET Core 3.0 or higher #96793
  • Test coverage for server OCSP stapling. #96791
    9.0.0
  • Assert failure: orObject->HasEmptySyncBlockInfo() #96790
    9.0.0
  • JIT doesn't see real type of field in a shared generic type with exact context #96787
    9.0.0
  • SslStreamCertificateContext stops fetching OCSP staples after one request failure #96770
    9.0.0
  • Blazor WASM (8.0 RC2) does not work on iOS 15.8 #96748
    8.0.x
  • [NETSDKE2E][Regression] With VSCode on Linux, debugging a .NET 9 project is failed with Unknown Error 0x80131c3c Unable to attach to CoreCLR. #96747
    9.0.0
  • NuGet authenticate task used by jitrollingbuild is deprecated #96745
    9.0.0
  • [ios][docs] Document how iOS library mode is supported #96742
    9.0.0
  • Start-up performance degradation of.NET 8 in Amazon Linux 2023 over Amazon Linux 2 #96740
  • [browser][debugger] Cannot set breakpoint in partial class defined in separate files #96734
  • [7.0] IJW build failure #96730
    7.0.x
  • [Android][Regression] * Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/metadata/object.c:657, condition `lock->done' not met #96804

Closed

  • [libraries-jitstress] Assertion failed 'ValidateUse(tree) && "Expected use of local to be tailcall value"' #96715
    9.0.0
  • ILogger Transform and Enrichment (Including Redaction prototyping) #84902
    9.0.0
  • Trace Enrichment support #84905
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce source generation based support for .NET metrics API #77516
    Future
  • Metrics Enrichment support #84903
    Future
  • Missing String.IndexOfAny method overload for System.Buffers.SearchValues<T> #96813
  • [wasm] AOT: `System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests` - `aot-instances.dll with exit code 137` #96631
  • [Feature Request]Allow MetricEventSource to expose the set of metrics configured by the app #90923
    9.0.0
  • Keyed services are not being returend by GetServices<T> #95576
  • [API Proposal]: Add public [Compute/Verify]IntegrityCheck methods to NegotiateAuthentication #86950
    9.0.0
  • DateTime.ParseExact with "r" specifier doesn't set Kind to Utc - why? #96789
  • ILVerification fails unexpectedly when encountering duplicate forwarders #96702
  • [API Proposal]: Remove Minimum or Maximum from SortedSet<T> in O(log n) time without comparisons #95780
  • Net8: ConfigurationBinder resets sub objects stored in dictionaries to default for json defined empty objects #96682
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Parse RFC 1779 compliant Distinguished Names #96750
  • Introduce `CallConvSwift` to represent the Swift ABI calling convention #64215
    9.0.0
  • [.NET 8.0.1] <PublishTrimmed> no longers works but throws build process for an infinite loop #96766
  • System.Text.Json: Class JsonSerializable source generation #96762
  • [API Proposal]: Expose `JsonObject` constructor that accepts a known-length `IReadOnlyCollection` to avoid unnecessary array resize operations #96417
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT library mode on iOS-like platforms #88737
    9.0.0
  • Size regression on win-x64 with managed objwriter #96665
  • Local running of libraries tests is broken #95762
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Detect static default interface methods in illink #96821
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [NativeAOT] ObjWriter: Fix over-alignment of .eh_frame entries #96817
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable EventSource manifest gen tests on stress runs. #96816
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • Remove Explicit Deletion of CMake `/GR` Flag as 3.20's *CMP0117* by Default Doesn't Add It #96814
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Do not include `NativeSinks.NativeAot.cs` without `FeaturePerfTracing` #96811
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix server-side OCSP stapling on Linux #96808
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [QUIC] Call silent shutdown in case `CloseAsync` failed. #96807
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Test #96806
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement remaining unimplemented APIs for ***Builder types #96805
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Change ampere queue name #96803
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Fix debug lazy loaded assemblies when webcil is enabled #96800
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Set FlagNetStandard1XDependencies=true and fix issues #96795
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Pass field's owner to getFieldType #96794
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add entire issuer chain to trusted X509_STORE when stapling OCSP_Response #96792
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix build of IJW test after VS upgrade #96788
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label
  • Reduce asm size of CollectionsMarshal.AsSpan #96773
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • STJ/JsonPropertyDictionary: eagerly initialize _propertyDictionary if known capacity #96769
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Patch jump trampolines on amd64/arm64 after a method has … #96757
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Align newly recognized loops #96756
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Clone newly recognized loops #96754
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Hoist in newly recognized loops #96753
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Unroll newly recognized loops #96752
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix assertion at System.Numerics.BigInteger.Parse #96746
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix assertion at System.Numerics.BigIntegerCalculator.Multiply #96744
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • chore(ilc/mach-o): add workaround or fix for problem with dead_strip #96743
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Added designated output instruction emitters #96741
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser][debugger] Test for: set breakpoint in partial class defined in separate files #96735
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add TextWriter.CreateBroadcasting #96732
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Slightly improve profiled casts #96731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_IH_3A` to `SVE_JO_3A` #95994
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT: Skip tailcall IR validation for struct calls #96719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete BundleHelper test project #96693
    area-Host
  • Set `s_naiveThreshold` to `const` in the release build. #96538
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Do not generate reflectable `sealed` methods as virtual #96738
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make NegotiateAuthentication.[Compute/Verify]IntegrityCheck APIs public #96712
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • JIT: Canonicalize newly recognized loops #96751
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix a crash in mono_jit_info_table_foreach_internal (). #96771
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add WasmDedup=false to S.N.Tensors.Tests #96701
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/7.0] Use NuGetAuthenticate@1 instead of @0 (#96651) #96667
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • PlaceInterfaceMethod is now more optimized #96703
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #96724
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #96725
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #96723
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • FIX ConfigurationBinder resets sub objects stored in dictionaries #96737
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Recover from failed OCSP download. #96448
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [HybridGlobalization] Include all globalization symbols #96684
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • STJ: set initial capacity of JsonObject if known (#96417) #96486
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Introduce CallConvSwift and special register types to represent the Swift ABI calling convention #95065
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • SPMI: Unindent jit-analysis header output #96749
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix bug in label printing in disasm #96136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Use multi-reg load/store for EncodeToUtf8 #95513
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated on SslStream #92684
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated #95733
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.x
  • Fix spelling mistakes in features.md #96739
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution, needs-area-label, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Enable Interop/UnmanagedCallersOnlyBasic on mini-arm64 #96657
    area-Interop-mono
  • JIT: Create preheaders on new loops and delete old loop canonicalization #96647
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Support library mode with NativeAOT on iOS-like platforms #93658
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [NativeAOT] ObjWriter: Produce COMDAT sections for .xdata unwinding data #96686
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Change IMarshallingGenerator resolution to use a sequential design instead of recursive #96632
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • [release/7.0][android] Bump to win 11 helix queue #96718
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-staging] [android] Bump to win 11 helix queue #96634
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Simplify methodtable #96466
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add ActiveIssue Annotations to Failing TestReadyToRun Tests and Reenable the Executables #96721
    disabled-test, area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] - CancellationToken for JSWebWorker #96696
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix `CopyStringDictionary` #96093
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE] Testing `Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0` PR #96459
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement KMAC #96025
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Made threadstatic helper call sites slightly simpler (static ctor case) #90641
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Adding vectorized implementations of Log2 to Vector64/128/256/512 #96455
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Move setting variables to HelixPreCommands #96713
    area-Infrastructure
  • [IGNORE] Gshared mrgctx #96108
    NO-REVIEW
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • CallSiteValidator doesn't cache results of the walk #96254
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • Updating Sum() implementation for Vector128 and Vector256 + adding lowering for Vector512 #95568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Enable more MT PLinq areas #96215
    arch-wasm, area-System.Linq.Parallel
  • [browser][HybridGlobalization] Improve speed performance of IndexOf and LastIndexOf text APIs with HybridGlobalization mode #95583
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Re-add Stack Overflow handling in NativeAOT with larger alternate stack #95808
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • KeyedCollection debug view doesn't work #96261
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Avoid copy action for root assemblies #96363
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add Arm64 encodings for SVE IF_SVE_CQ_4A_A to IF_SVE_HT_4A group #96214
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move arm64 insOpts entries into insScalableOpts #96692
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make changes nescessary to build IL asm grammar with Bison. #89704
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Refine Bin/Hex parsing of BigInteger #95543
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix fast-path support for ignoring nullable value types #96669
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.x
  • [mono][interp] Add SSA transformation and SSA based optimization #96315
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix native memory leak on OCSP_Response #96577
    area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix native memory leak on OCSP_Response #96578
    area-System.Security, 7.0.x
  • Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #95404
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Enable On Stack Replacement #96558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • extend MemoryCache with `ICollection<object> Keys` property #94992
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching, 9.0.0
  • Make RandomAccess.Read*|Write* methods work with non-seekable files #96711
    area-System.IO, 9.0.0
  • Fix: OID's cache poisoning with random values #93661
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Improve System.DirectoryServices interop guidelines conformance #93722
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Hardware accelerated implementation of Quaternion multiply #96624
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Allow BBJ_COND false target to diverge from bbNext in layout optimization phase #96609
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0 #95980
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Move PendingTypeLoadTable from the ClassLoader object to a global structure #96653
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64, when the file offset is >4GB #94970
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Gen0 segment should always be reported as Gen0 for DacHeapWalker #96640
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Green Thread Experiment Results #2398

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] A couple of missing symbol fixes #2482

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Move `RhpPInvoke` and undefine `BACKGROUND_GC` #2481
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Use `Dfs::Contains` for reachability checking #2480

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The type or namespace name are missing a using directive or an assembly reference? #37884
  • .NET 8 fails to resolve workload on Fedora #37880
  • [9.0.100-alpha.1.24055.6] dotnet tool install command doesn't show install successful message #37879

Closed

  • 8.0.1 hosting bundle no longer allows net8.0-windows #37892

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0.2xx] Add dotnet package search #37916
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove TaskWithAssemblyResolveHooks #37913
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37911
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #37910
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #37909
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #37908
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] [Wasm] Disable accelerated builds in Visual Studio for wasm projects #37900
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Unset SuppressTfmSupportBuildWarnings #37897
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use runtime packs for NativeAOT on .NET 9.0 or higher #37872
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK

Merged

  • Add dotnet package search #36289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #37862
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37873
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove extraneous issue template option #37805
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add comment #37753
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Wasm] Disable accelerated builds in Visual Studio for wasm projects #37791
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk
  • Update the framework for It_publishes_with_or_without_apphost test #37834
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #37846
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #37852
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #37850
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.3xx #37849
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.4xx #37848
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #37847
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #37845
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2350475 #37856
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [fix #37501] Consolidate message emission for dotnet tool install in default verbosity mode(quiet) #37853
    Area-Tools
  • Let runtime supply the portable RID graph #36807
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [Blazor] Disable accelerated builds in Visual Studio for Blazor webassembly projects (6.0) #37793
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [Blazor] Disable accelerated builds in Visual Studio for Blazor webassembly projects (7.0) #37794
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37851
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add tool list format option #37394
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • add devcontainer support #37412
    untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Add `private` and `namespace` accessibility modifiers for top-level types. #6794
    Working Set
  • Simple encoding of unions in C# #7544

PullRequests

Created

  • Interceptors open issues for C# 13 #7835
  • Include default values and `params` modifier in method group natural type #7834

Updated

  • Collection expressions: use iteration type for convertibility of element types #7783
  • Collection expressions: require applicable constructor and Add method for target type implementing IEnumerable #7802

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Compiler tests failing on `net8.0` #71571
    17.10
  • Semantic snippets don't fallback to VS options properly #71570
  • Nested catch rethrows the parent exception in async methods #71569
    17.10
  • Go to definition doesn't mark the selected symbol the first time but just opens the source file #71568

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a test for 'Params Collections.' #71572
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Fix ref field load in assignment #71566
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Fork diag/code-action tests to ones without editor dep. 7/N #71564
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fork diag/code-action tests to ones without editor dep. 6/N #71563
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fork diag/code-action tests to ones without editor dep. 5/N #71562
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fork diag/code-action tests to ones without editor dep. 4/N #71561
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fork diag/code-action tests to ones without editor dep. 3/N #71560
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Enable some dynamic collection expression tests which were disabled during merge from 'main'. #71558
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Update roslyn solution #71559
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove test construction dependencies on workspace #71552
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fork diag/code-action tests to ones without editor dep. 1/N #71555
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge main to features/lsp_configuration #71573
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fork diag/code-action tests to ones without editor dep. 2/N #71557
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update other BCL to 8.0.0 #71516
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify how RunTests handles TFMs #71556
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run integration tests on helix #71328
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fixes nested code actions in LSP bug #71456
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: method type re-inference #71214
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Speed up integration test build by only building required dependencies #71289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add some more incremental generator docs #71059
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not report conflicting types errors for source-generated APIs #71546
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Start local function analysis in unreachable state #71506
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Separate the process of creating an event accessor parameter and the process of figuring out its type. #71497
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Disallow `ref` to `in`/`ref readonly` method parameter conversion #71531
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Move EnC tests to Features layer #71525
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Optimize nullable value type constant comparison codegen #68069
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • Update ILVerify bits #71544
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move to 8.0 #71507
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Use runtime helper `CreateSpan` for `stackalloc` of non-byte arrays #71261
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Feature Requested] Add Auto Change Layout Direction (Rtl , Ltr) By Button Or Change Culture #53292
  • Cannot scaffold Identity due to ambiguous calls between extension methods. #53290
  • [Blazor] `@key` is not respected for interactive WebAssembly components after publish #53289

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The same alias is sometimes used in multiple (non-conflicting) aliases #32778
  • Regression: GroupBy generates invalid SQL when using custom database function #32772
  • StartsWith generates incorrect sql when DbType is AnsiStringFixedLength #32771
  • Owned entity on genericly typed entity generates unwanted steps in new migrations #32763
  • FindAsync Doesn't Respect QueryTrackingBehavior #32762

Closed

  • API request failed application stops automatically #32723
  • SQL Server: Take(0) with non-zero Skip() still errors #32767
    9.0.0
  • NotSupportedException while executing to inserts in EF Core 8 #32765
  • FirstOrDefaultAsync performance issue when the db entity contains a very large BLOB #32766
  • ThenInclude with GroupBy unexpected behavior #32725
  • Mapping nullable DB conlumns to non-nullable Entity properties #32718
  • Generating migrations for `DbContext`based on schema #32675
  • About call SqlQueryRaw #32654
  • Cosmos tests sometimes run out of internal service providers #32647
    9.0.0
  • How to translate a custom method on a type to SQL to improve performance on a JSON column in EF8? #32643
  • Add setting to make migration script creation use EXEC(string) for migrationBuilder.Sql(...) generation #32526
  • ISaveChangesInterceptor.SaveChangesFailed is not triggered by DbUpdateConcurrencyException #32750
  • Exception when writing a JSON column with negative enum value #32679
    8.0.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix IncludeExpression pruning for nested owned entities in ExecuteUpdate/Delete #32773
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.Core issue with multiple Blob colums #32770
  • [release/8.x] Produce uncorrelated IN for Contains with nullable item (#32575) #32764
    Servicing-consider
  • Test migration path generation #32760

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Change the return type of OwnedNavigationBuilder.PrimitiveCollection #32753
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #32774
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #32769
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Correct SQL Server Take(0) compensating logic #32768
  • [release/6.0] Test only/disable broken test #32761
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #32759
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #32758
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/8.0] Don't detect join table with other incoming references as a simple join table #32729
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Don't try to cast negative enum values to ulong #32731
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • Add --disable-build-servers to bundle command #32737
